# setCropRectangle(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the crop rectangle value at a time within the time range of the instruction.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func setCropRectangle(_ rect: CGRect, at time: CMTime)
```

## Configuring the crop rectangle

- **addCropRectangleRamp(_:)**: Sets a crop rectangle ramp to apply during the specified time range.
- **cropRectangleRamp(at:)**: Obtains the crop rectangle ramp that includes the specified time.
